parameters: And... that should do it. Let's report back to Bor-san.
Did we really need to shove
(Someone's over there. Are they from Sheila?)
I think... I can see faint outlines of people on the other side.
Isn't this just going to get
It's fine. This place is a
Some kind of heavy object was thrown into the cavity... and
judging from the sound it made upon landing... I think I may
Are the Sheilans using this place as a disposal site, too?
Maxim-san never mentioned anything about that, though...
Anyway, since it's on the way to the scrapyard, I can check it
Oh. Is that you, Maxim-san? Pretty rare to see you down here.
Heh-heh-heh. I've been looking for you, Erina-chan...
You sound like a villain talking like that, Maxim-san.
Yeah. If it's to turn you into a cute "bunny," then villain I am.
(He smells like alcohol... Is he drunk?)
Maxim-san handed me... some kind of outfit and also a request.
The contents of the request is...
Recruiting employees for Bunny Rabbit? What's this?
Whatever, just get dressed and we'll start rehearsals. Everyone's
waiting at Bar Agenda, so get a move on.
I don't have the startup key.
Sorry, the elevator's in the middle of an inspection.
Sorry, miss, I don't have money to buy you.
That's not the reason why I talked to you...
Miss, you're an engineer, right? I hear you've been making some
interesting contraptions from those Era Engineering Books.
Oh, do you know something about them?
Maybe. If you help me out, I can pass you tips whenever I get
I make a living selling scraps.
But interested buyers are pretty limited. I heard word on the
street about you and figured we could come to an agreement.
I see. You're right that I don't have the luxury to be digging
around for scraps all the time, so that'd be pretty helpul.
Looks like we got a deal. See you soon.
Nice. I hope I get the chance to have sex with a woman like you
By the way... I'm not cutting any deals just because you showed
It's my daily routine to visit the graveyard at night. I've yet
to come across actual treasure, though.
But... I did come across an unusual individual down there, a young
You saw a girl? True, that's pretty unusual.
From a distance, yeah. But I didn't bother calling to her since
she was nowhere as fine as you, Erina.
Leaving already? Just take your time.
Not often you get to see a naked babe.
You've had your fun. Plus, I'm not showing you my body because
It's my daily routine to visit the graveyard at night. I've yet
to come across actual treasure, though.
But... I did come across an unusual individual down there, a young
You saw a girl? True, that's pretty unusual.
From a distance, yeah. But I didn't bother calling to her since
she was nowhere as fine as you, Erina.

parameters.text:
Accepted "Bunny Rabbit Employee."

Details can be checked in the written request.

---

First, change into your designated outfit and then head to
Bar Agenda.

parameters: Yo, Erina. Bor's been looking for you.
